casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua BOLEN 193P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 25, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Joshua Bolen, for Bolen, Joshua.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2018 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of June 2018."
